Incluye estos cr√©ditos: 
{{32.`2`}}

INSTRUCCIONES DE FORMATO:

Toma el "TEXTO FUENTE" y √∫salo como la primera frase. Solo puedes a√±adir emojis.

En la misma l√≠nea o la siguiente, pega los "CR√âDITOS".

A√±ade una sola l√≠nea de CTA: "üëâ ¬°S√çGUENOS para m√°s!"

Genera 15 hashtags virales en un solo bloque, sin puntos intermedios.

RESTRICCI√ìN M√ÅXIMA: La salida debe empezar directamente con el texto fuente. Si empiezas con "Aqu√≠ tienes", el proceso fallar√°.

nested.help:
**Photo Requirements**
- Maximum file size: 8MiB
- Aspect ratio: Must be within a 4:5 to 1.91:1 range
- Minimum width: 320 (will be scaled up to the minimum if necessary)
- Maximum width: 1440 (will be scaled down to the maximum if necessary)
- Height: Varies, depending on width and aspect ratio
- Format: JPEG only

Please note that your image must be hosted on a publicly accessible URL. You cannot use files from Google Drive even if they are shared publicly: the Instagram API is not able to download files from there.
For other similar services, you may need to adjust the URL with a `replace` function. You can search the web for `[service name] raw file link` to try to find workarounds.
nested.name: image_url
nested.label: Photo URL

spec.help: Must not start with `@`. User must have a public Instagram account.
spec.name: username
spec.label: Username

spec.help: An optional float that indicates percentage distance from left edge of the published media image.
spec.name: x
spec.label: X position

spec.help: An optional float that indicates percentage distance from top edge of the published media image.
spec.name: y
spec.label: Y position

nested.help:
**Photo Requirements**
- Maximum file size: 100MiB
- Picture size:
  „Éª Maximum columns (horizontal pixels): 1920
  „Éª Minimum aspect ratio [cols / rows]: 4 / 5
  „Éª Maximum aspect ratio [cols / rows]: 16 / 9
- Duration: 60 seconds max, 3 seconds min
- Container: MOV or MP4 (MPEG-4 Part 14), no edit lists, moov atom at the front of the file
- Frame rate: 23-60 FPS
- Video codec: HEVC or H264, progressive scan, closed GOP, 4:2:0 chroma subsampling
- Video bitrate: VBR, 5Mbps maximum
- Audio codec: AAC, 48khz sample rate maximum, 1 or 2 channels (mono or stereo)
- Audio bitrate: 128kbps

Please note that your video must be hosted on a publicly accessible URL. You cannot use files from Google Drive even if they are shared publicly: the Instagram API is not able to download files from there.
For other similar services, you may need to adjust the URL with a `replace` function. You can search the web for `[service name] raw file link` to try to find workarounds.
nested.name: video_url
nested.label: Video URL

nested.help: Location, in milliseconds, of the reel frame to be used as the cover thumbnail image. The default value is `0`, which is the first frame of the reel.
nested.name: thumb_offset
nested.label: Cover Frame
